author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
Defines a new era `run2_nanoAOD_94X2016` and configures the nanoAOD appropriately:
 * same object IDs as for 2017 94X miniAOD v2 for jets, b-tag, taus
 * E/γ scale and smearing for 2016 legacy re-reco, and storing of both the 2016 and 2017 IDs
title: NanoAOD for 2016 94X re-miniAOD (94X branch)
